title: A Força do Querer
overview: An ambitious woman who, for love, abandons Law School and ends up in the criminal world. A policewoman who dreams about becoming a MMA champion while fighting organized crime. A young dreamer torn between finding true love and her search for freedom. Written by International Emmy Award winner Gloria Perez, A Força do Querer presents three strong-willed women that have one thing in common: the tenacity to fight for what they want.
